Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description: Represents a participant in the congress.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Participant (Firebase Auth UID).

avatarUrl.description: URL of the participant's profile picture.

digitalCredentialQR.description: Data for the QR code, which is the user's UID.

points.description: Total gamification points earned by the participant.

CongressEvent.title: CongressEvent
CongressEvent.description: Represents a specific event within the congress.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CongressEvent entity.

dateTime.description: Date and time of the event.

location.description: The location or modality of the event (e.g., Auditorium, Online).

imageUrl.description: URL of the event's representative image.

Attendance.title: Attendance
Attendance.description: Represents a record of a participant's attendance at a specific congress event.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Attendance entity.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the attendance was recorded.

Administrator.title: Administrator
Administrator.description: Represents an administrator user with special privileges.

id.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the admin user.

definition.description: Collection to store administrator roles. Document ID is the user's UID.

params.name: uid
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the administrator.

definition.description: Collection to store participant profile data. User ID is the Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the participant.

definition.description: Sub-collection to store attendance records for a specific user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

params.name: attendanceId
params.description: The unique ID of the attendance record.

definition.description: Collection to store all congress events. Managed by admins.

params.name: congressEventId
params.description: The unique ID of the congress event.
